title: Ep. 527 - Trump Is Sending In The Feds. Better Late Than Never.
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, Trump is finally sending in a “surge” of federal law enforcement officers to tamp down the violence and anarchy in our cities. Better late than never. Also Five Headlines including the BLM supporter who is pictured kneeling on the neck of a toddler. And in our Daily Cancellation, we will cancel the “virtual fans” that Fox is planning to use during their sports broadcasts.

Get your copy of "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" here: https://utm.io/uHjZ

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
